Magic Notes:
Aberrant Dragonmark: Knows 1 S0 cantrip and may cast a chosen S1 spell 1/long rest, optionally randomly gaining 1 HD temporary HP or inflicting 1 HD force to a creature w/in 30'
Magic Item Master: May attune 6 items simultaneously
Magic Item Savant: May attune 5 items simultaneously
Alchemical Savant: Spells cast using alchemical supplies gain +3 HP healing or acid, fire, necrotic, or poison damage
Arcane Firearm: Spells cast through a prepared wand, staff, or rod inflict +1d8 HP damage
Boots Of The Winding Path: Wearer of infused boots may teleport back to a space w/in 15'
Chemical Mastery: May use alchemist's supplies to cast Greater Restoration and Heal 1/long rest
Elemental Adept (Lightning): Spells that inflict lightning damage ignore resistance and treat 1s as 2s on damage dice
Enhanced Arcane Focus: Infused rod, staff, or wand gives +2 spell attacks that ignore half cover
Enhanced Defense: Infused armor or shield gives +2 AC
Enhanced Weapon: Infused weapon gives +2 attack and damage
Experimental Elixir: May use alchemist's supplies after a long rest to create 3 elixirs of healing, swiftness, resilience, boldness, flight, or transformation; may spend spell slots to create additional elixirs
Homunculus Servant: May create a mechanical companion (AC 13; HP 24; Attack R30' +9 inflicts 1d4+6 HP force; Evasion; Channel Magic)
Infuse Item: May infuse 6 items simultaneously
Magic Item Adept: May attune 6 items simultaneously/May craft uncommon magic items in one quarter time at half cost
Magic Item Savant: May ignore attunement and use requirements on attuned items
Magical Tinkering: May imbue 3 objects simultaneously with light, message, sound, odor, or picture
Radiant Weapon: Infused weapon w/4 charges gives +1 attack and damage and emits a 30' bright light on command; wielder may use Reaction and 1 charge to blind a successful attacker (DC 17 Constitution neg) for 1 rd; item regains 1d4 charges each dawn
Repeating Shot: Infused ammunition weapon gives +1 attack and damage and automatically creates its own ammunition
Replicate Magic Item: Allows replication of a wondrous item
Repulsion Shield: Infused shield w/4 charges gives +1 AC; holder may use Reaction and 1 charge to push a successful attacker 15'; regains 1d4 charges each dawn
Resistant Armor: Infused armor gives +1 AC and resistance to chosen damage type
Restorative Reagents: May use alchemist's supplies to cast Lesser Restoration 3/long rest/Elixirs give 2d6+3 temporary HP
Returning Weapon: Infused thrown weapon gives +1 attack and damage and returns after being thrown
Spellcasting: Can cast spells from the artificer spell list and cast spells marked with [R] using a ritual
Notes
Validation Errors: Selectable Feature Allocation: 13 available vs. 14 allocated
